input.sentences: it was a beautiful day all around .
they wondered what was on the other side .
should they go back inside ? or keep exploring ?
output.sentences: The sun was out and two lonely chairs waited for people to come sit down on them.
A babbling brook lapped at the rocks with excitement that the sun was finally out and spring was here.
The brook reached a small tunnel underneath a bridge, leading a small, furry adventure to new places.
The tunnel ended at a building with unknown purposes.
Our small, furry adventurer looked inside to see what was going on.
